channel.title: Additional meta data for SoundCloud uploads
channel.description:
Just thought it would be easier to have an option for description, additional tags, etc. I say this because as of right now, i have to upload via Auxy, then get on my computer to add description or additional tags
please tell me if there is an easier way also:)

item.title: Additional meta data for SoundCloud uploads
item.dc:creator: endm-usa
item.description:
Upload with Auxy from the app as a private track, then go to Pulse and do the title and tags and description. Sadly the artwork cannot be changed from Pulse.

Read full topic
item.source: Additional meta data for SoundCloud uploads
